statements: SELECT * FROM mentorship_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM mentorship_program;
SELECT mentor_id, mentee_id, mentorship_status FROM mentorship_program;
SELECT * FROM mentorship_program WHERE mentor_id = 101;
SELECT program_name, mentorship_status FROM mentorship_program WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mentorship_program WHERE mentorship_status='active';
SELECT mentor_id, program_name FROM mentorship_program WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT mentee_id, end_date FROM mentorship_program WHERE program_name LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT * FROM mentorship_program ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT mentor_id, program_name, mentorship_status FROM mentorship_program WHERE start_date < '2022-03-15' AND (mentorship_status='active' OR mentorship_status='pending') LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MentorshipProgram;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM MentorshipProgram;
SELECT mentor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Mentor;
SELECT * FROM Mentor WHERE available_hours_per_week > 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Mentor WHERE expertise_area = 'Software Development';
SELECT * FROM MentorshipProgram WHERE program_id = 5;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM MentorshipProgram WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT first_name, last_name, expertise_area FROM Mentor WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT mentor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Mentor WHERE expertise_area = 'Programming' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM MentorshipProgram WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Mentors;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email FROM Mentors WHERE mentor_area_of_expertise = 'Technology';
SELECT mentor_name, mentee_name, start_date FROM Mentors JOIN MentorshipPairs ON Mentors.mentor_id = MentorshipPairs.mentor_id JOIN Mentees ON MentorshipPairs.mentee_id = Mentees.mentee_id;
SELECT * FROM Mentees WHERE mentee_department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY mentee_name ASC;

SELECT mentor_name, mentee_name, start_date, end_date FROM Mentors JOIN MentorshipPairs ON Mentors.mentor_id = MentorshipPairs.mentor_id JOIN Mentees ON MentorshipPairs.mentee_id = Mentees.mentee_id WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Mentors;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_area_of_expertise FROM Mentors WHERE mentor_area_of_expertise = 'Technology' ORDER BY mentor_name DESC;

SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentee_name, mentee_email FROM Mentors JOIN MentorshipPairs ON Mentors.mentor_id = MentorshipPairs.mentor_id JOIN Mentees ON MentorshipPairs.mentee_id = Mentees.mentee_id;

SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentee_name, mentee_email, start_date, end_date FROM Mentors JOIN MentorshipPairs ON Mentors.mentor_id = MentorshipPairs.mentor_id JOIN Mentees ON MentorshipPairs.mentee_id = Mentees.mentee_id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentee_name, mentee_email FROM Mentors JOIN MentorshipPairs ON Mentors.mentor_id = MentorshipPairs.mentor_id JOIN Mentees ON MentorshipPairs.mentee_id = Mentees.mentee_id WHERE mentee_department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY mentor_name ASC, mentee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mentors;
SELECT mentor_name, gender FROM mentors WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT mentee_name, department FROM mentees WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT mentor_name, mentee_name FROM mentors, mentees, mentorship_pairs WHERE mentors.mentor_id = mentorship_pairs.mentor_id AND mentees.mentee_id = mentorship_pairs.mentee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_pairs FROM mentorship_pairs;
SELECT mentor_name, gender, department FROM mentors WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT mentee_name, department FROM mentees ORDER BY mentee_name DESC;
SELECT mentor_name, mentee_name, start_date, end_date FROM mentors INNER JOIN mentorship_pairs ON mentors.mentor_id = mentorship_pairs.mentor_id;

SELECT mentor_name, mentee_name, feedback_text FROM mentors INNER JOIN mentorship_pairs ON mentors.mentor_id = mentorship_pairs.mentor_id INNER JOIN mentorship_feedback ON mentorship_pairs.pair_id = mentorship_feedback.pair_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT mentor_name, gender, department FROM mentors WHERE department LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY mentor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM mentorship_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM mentorship_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentor_experience FROM mentors WHERE mentor_department = 'Engineering';
SELECT mentee_name, mentee_gender FROM mentees WHERE mentee_department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY mentee_name ASC;
SELECT session_date, mentor_rating, mentee_rating FROM mentorship_feedback WHERE session_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM mentorship_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM mentorship_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_department FROM mentors WHERE mentor_experience > 5;
SELECT mentee_name, mentee_gender FROM mentees WHERE mentee_gender = 'Other';
SELECT session_date, program_id, mentor_id, mentee_id FROM mentorship_sessions WHERE program_id = 3 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
